ðŸ“Œ Key Features
Right-Click to Save Content
Quickly add selected text to your Supabase database by right-clicking and choosing the desired label. No more manual copying and pasting between tabs.

Custom Labels for Organized Data
Create and manage custom labels that correspond to your Supabase table columns. Easily categorize and structure the information you collect.

Labeling Mode
Activate Labeling Mode to transform selected text into new labels on the fly. Simply hover over text to create and add new labels seamlessly.

Submit Data Directly to Supabase
Compile your collected data into a row and submit it directly to your specified Supabase table with a single click.

Clear Data with Ease
Need to start fresh? Clear your current data collection effortlessly to begin a new entry.

User-Friendly Interface
An intuitive UI allows you to configure your Supabase connection, manage labels, and control settings without any hassle.

ðŸ’¡ Use Cases
Research and Note-Taking
Collect important snippets of information while browsing and organize them directly in your Supabase database for easy reference.

Content Curation
Save quotes, articles, or any valuable content you come across online, categorizing them with custom labels for future projects.

Data Entry Automation
Streamline the process of adding data to your Supabase tables by capturing information directly from websites.

Project Management
Gather resources, links, and notes for your projects without leaving your browser, keeping everything organized in your database.

Education and Study
Save study materials, references, and important excerpts directly to your database for efficient learning and revision.

ðŸ”’ Privacy Focused
Supabase Saver respects your privacy. All your Supabase credentials and data are stored locally in your browser's storage and are never shared with third parties. The extension communicates directly with your Supabase instance using your provided credentials.

ðŸš€ Getting Started
Install Supabase Saver
Add the extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.

Configure Supabase Settings
Open the extension and enter your Supabase URL, API Key, and the table name where you want to store data.

Create Custom Labels
Define labels that match your Supabase table columns for organized data entry.

Toggle Labeling Mode
Activate Labeling Mode to create new labels by hovering over text, or keep it off to add content to existing labels via right-click.

Start Saving Content
Select text on any webpage, right-click, and assign it to a label. Build your data row as you browse.

Submit Your Data
Once you've collected all the necessary information, submit the row directly to your Supabase table through the extension.

Customization: Fully control labels and data collection methods.
Simplicity: User-friendly design makes it easy for anyone to use.
